name: TISDAR (Thünen Institute Scientific Data Repository)
description: Supports searching, downloading, storing and describing spatial data (Shapefiles, GeoTiffs, Excel, PDFs, scripts) from the Thünen Institute via web interface. Metadata is described using ISO 19139 schema. Focus on ease of handling and data with spatial information. Not public; only offered internally. Quality-checked data is transferred to the open Thünen-Atlas portal for public access.
